name: AUGenericViewDisplayFlags
desc: Flags that describe the display of a generic view.

items.name: static var viewParametersDisplayFlag: AUGenericViewDisplayFlags
items.desc: If set, the generic view displays the audio unit parameters of the audio unit.

items.name: static var viewPropertiesDisplayFlag: AUGenericViewDisplayFlags
items.desc: If set, the generic view displays the audio unit properties of the audio unit.

items.name: static var viewTitleDisplayFlag: AUGenericViewDisplayFlags
items.desc: If set, the generic view displays the title and manufacturer of the audio unit.
